message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for a great price of $95. I think you'll find it's a steal at this rate!
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the suggestion, but I believe I can find a better deal elsewhere. I would like to propose a price of $85 for the product.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand you're looking for a good deal. How about we meet in the middle at $90?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. I would like to counter with an offer of $87 for the product.
